c:attribute.name: presence
c:attribute.description: Reflects the state of a presence device.

c:attribute.name: presencechanged
c:attribute.description: UTC date time of last presence change

c:attribute.name: person
c:attribute.description: The address of the person currently associated with this presence detector

c:attribute.name: usehint
c:attribute.description: What this presence detector is used for. PERSON detects presence/absence of a person, OTHER something else (pet for example), UNKNOWN is unassigned.
